00010 #ifndef __EVENT_H__
00011 #define __EVENT_H__

00020 struct EventData {
00021  EventData(void* own = NULL) : owner(own) {}
00022 
00023  void* owner;
00024 };
00025 
00026 
00027 class _Event {};
00028 
00029 /*
00030  This is an Event class, which represents a possible event.
00031  It handles all the event handlers.
00032 
00033  _Data should provide at least an owner field like EventData
00034  */
00035 template< typename _Data = EventData >
00036 class Event : public _Event {
00037 public:
00038  class Handler {
00039  public:
00040   typedef _Data Data;
00041   virtual ~Handler() {}
00042   virtual void operator()(_Data data) = 0;
00043   virtual bool operator==(const Handler& hndl) = 0;
00044   virtual Handler* copy() const = 0;
00045  };
00046 
00047  typedef std::list< Ref<Handler> > HandlerList;
00048 
00049 protected:
00050  class HandlerAccessor {
00051  private:
00052   Event* base;
00053  public:
00054   HandlerAccessor(Event* b) : base(b) {}
00055   HandlerAccessor& operator=(const Ref<Handler>& h) { base->m_handlers.clear(); if(h.isSet()) base->m_handlers.push_back(h); return *this; }
00056   HandlerAccessor& operator+=(const Ref<Handler>& h) { if(h.isSet()) base->m_handlers.push_back(h); return *this; }
00057   HandlerAccessor& operator-=(const Ref<Handler>& h) {
00058    for(typename Event::HandlerList::iterator i = base->m_handlers.begin(); i != base->m_handlers.end(); ++i)
00059     if(i->get() == h.get()) {
00060      base->m_handlers.erase(i);
00061      break;
00062     }
00063    return *this;
00064   }
00065 
00066   const typename Event::HandlerList& get() { return base->m_handlers; }
00067  };
00068 
00069 private:
00070  friend class HandlerAccessor;
00071  HandlerList m_handlers;
00072 
00073 public:
00074  Event() {}
00075  ~Event() { if (mainQueue) mainQueue->removeCustomEvents(this); }
00076  Event(const Event& e) { (*this) = e; }
00077  Event& operator=(const Event& e) { m_handlers = e.m_handlers; return *this; }
00078  HandlerAccessor handler() { return HandlerAccessor(this); }
00079 
00080  void pushToMainQueue(_Data data) { if(mainQueue) mainQueue->push(new EventThrower<_Data>(this, data)); }
00081 
00082  void occurred(_Data data) {
00083   callHandlers(m_handlers, data);
00084  }
00085  static void callHandlers(HandlerList& handlers, _Data data) {
00086   for(typename HandlerList::iterator i = handlers.begin(); i != handlers.end(); ++i)
00087    i->get()(data);
00088  }
00089 };
00090 
00091 
00092 template< typename _Base, typename _Data = EventData >
00093 class MemberFunction : public Event<_Data>::Handler {
00094 public:
00095  typedef void (_Base::*Function) (_Data data);
00096 private:
00097  _Base* m_obj;
00098  Function m_fct;
00099 public:
00100  MemberFunction(_Base* obj, Function fct) : m_obj(obj), m_fct(fct) {}
00101  MemberFunction(const MemberFunction& other) : m_obj(other.m_obj), m_fct(other.m_fct) {}
00102 
00103  virtual void operator()(_Data data) { (*m_obj.*m_fct)(data); }
00104  virtual bool operator==(const typename Event<_Data>::Handler& hndl) {
00105   const MemberFunction* hPtr = dynamic_cast<const MemberFunction*>(&hndl);
00106   if(hPtr == NULL) return false;
00107   return hPtr->m_obj == m_obj && hPtr->m_fct == m_fct;
00108  }
00109  virtual typename Event<_Data>::Handler* copy() const { return new MemberFunction(m_obj, m_fct); }
00110 };
00111 
00112 
00113 template< typename _Data = EventData >
00114 class StaticFunction : public Event<_Data>::Handler {
00115 public:
00116  typedef void (*Function) (_Data data);
00117 private:
00118  Function m_fct;
00119 public:
00120  StaticFunction(Function fct) : m_fct(fct) {}
00121  StaticFunction(const StaticFunction& other) : m_fct(other.m_fct) {}
00122 
00123  virtual void operator()(_Data data) { (m_fct)(data); }
00124  virtual bool operator==(const typename Event<_Data>::Handler& hndl) {
00125   const StaticFunction* hPtr = dynamic_cast<const StaticFunction*>(&hndl);
00126   if(hPtr == NULL) return false;
00127   return hPtr->m_fct == m_fct;
00128  }
00129  virtual typename Event<_Data>::Handler* copy() const { return new StaticFunction(m_fct); }
00130 };
00131 
00132 
00133 template< typename _Base, typename _Data >
00134 Ref<class Event<_Data>::Handler> getEventHandler( _Base* obj, void (_Base::*fct) (_Data data) ) {
00135  return new MemberFunction<_Base,_Data>( obj, fct );
00136 }
00137 
00138 template< typename _Data >
00139 Ref<class Event<_Data>::Handler> getEventHandler( void (*fct) (_Data data) ) {
00140  return new StaticFunction<_Data>( fct );
00141 }
00142 
00143 #endif
